trans-unit.source: Represents the process model for implementing XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 代表實作 XML 加密的處理序模型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class is the main class used for XML encryption in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>類別是.NET Framework 中的 XML 加密所使用的主要類別。

trans-unit.source: XML Encryption is a standards-based, interoperable way to encrypt all or part of an XML document or any arbitrary data.
trans-unit.target: XML 加密是標準為基礎、 可互通的方式，來加密所有或部分的 XML 文件或任意資料。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework XML encryption classes implement the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification for XML encryption located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework XML 加密類別實作全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 規格，XML 加密位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class whenever you need to share encrypted XML data between applications or organizations in a standard way.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>類別，每當您需要共用加密的 XML 資料，應用程式或組織之間以標準方式。

trans-unit.source: Any data encrypted using this class can be decrypted by any implementation of the W3C specification for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 任何實作 XML 加密的 W3C 規格，來解密加密使用這個類別的任何資料。

trans-unit.source: XML encryption replaces any plain text XML element or document with the `<EncryptedData>` element, which contains an encrypted (or cipher text) representation of plain text XML or any arbitrary data.
trans-unit.target: XML 加密會取代任何純文字 XML 項目或文件`<EncryptedData>`元素，其包含已加密 （或加密文字） 的純文字 XML 表示法或任意資料。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedData>` element can optionally contain information about where to find a key that will decrypt the cipher text, and which cryptographic algorithm was used to encrypt the plain text.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptedData>`項目可選擇性地包含有關在哪裡找到索引鍵，將會解密加密文字，以及哪一個密碼編譯演算法用來加密純文字。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedKey>` element is similar to the `<EncryptedData>` element in style and usage, except that it allows you to encrypt a key that will decrypt the value of the `<EncryptedData>` element.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptedKey>`項目是類似於`<EncryptedData>`樣式和使用方式，但它可以讓您加密會解密值的索引鍵的項目`<EncryptedData>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Note that the `<EncryptedKey>` element and the `<EncryptedData>` element will never contain an unencrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，`<EncryptedKey>`項目和`<EncryptedData>`元素絕不會包含未加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following methods to exchange key information:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用下列方法之一來交換金鑰資訊：

trans-unit.source: Do not include any key information.
trans-unit.target: 不包含任何金鑰資訊。

trans-unit.source: If you choose this option, both parties must agree on an algorithm and key before they exchange encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇此選項，則這兩個合作對象必須先同意演算法和金鑰，才能交換加密的資料。

trans-unit.source: Include the location of the key in the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) attribute of the `<RetrievalMethod>` element.
trans-unit.target: 統一資源識別元 (URI) 屬性中包含金鑰的位置`<RetrievalMethod>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Both parties must agree on the key location ahead of time and this location must be kept secret.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個合作對象必須同意事先金鑰的位置，此位置必須保持機密。

trans-unit.source: Include a string name that maps to a key in the `<KeyName>` element.
trans-unit.target: 包含對應中的索引鍵的字串名稱`<KeyName>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Both parties must agree on the key name mapping before they exchange encrypted data and this mapping must be kept secret.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個合作對象必須同意的金鑰名稱對應，然後再交換加密的資料，以及此對應必須保持機密。

trans-unit.source: Include an encrypted key in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: 包含已加密的金鑰，在`<EncryptedKey>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Both parties must agree on the key that decrypts the encrypted key before they exchange encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個合作對象必須同意才能交換加密的資料解密的加密的金鑰的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally include a name or location of the key that will decrypt the key in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地包含名稱或位置將會解密中的索引鍵之索引鍵`<EncryptedKey>`項目。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的公用程式類別，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES>演算法來加密 XML 文件。

trans-unit.target: 此範例不包含任何金鑰資訊加密的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The `document` parameter comprises the XML elements that later form the encrypted XML.
trans-unit.target: `document`參數包含稍後形成加密的 XML 的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The name to map to <c>keyObject</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要對應至 <c>keyObject</c> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The symmetric key to map to <c>keyName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要對應至 <c>keyName</c> 的對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Defines a mapping between a key name and a symmetric key or an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 定義金鑰名稱和對稱金鑰或非對稱金鑰之間的對應。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.AddKeyNameMapping%2A> method allows you to map a symmetric key or an asymmetric key to a string name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.AddKeyNameMapping%2A>方法可讓您將對稱金鑰或非對稱金鑰對應至字串名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method adds the values of the `keyName` and `keyObject` parameters to a table of valid key name mappings.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法中加入的值`keyName`和`keyObject`參數的有效索引鍵資料表名稱對應。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.ClearKeyNameMappings%2A> method to clear the key name mappings table.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.ClearKeyNameMappings%2A>方法，以清除索引鍵名稱對應資料表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密使用對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example embeds a key name in the encrypted XML document that the decrypting method uses to find the appropriate decryption key.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會解密方法用來尋找適當的解密金鑰加密 XML 文件中內嵌索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="keyName" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyName" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value of the <paramref name="keyObject" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyObject" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="keyObject" /> parameter is not an RSA algorithm or a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyObject" /> 參數的值不是 RSA 演算法或對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Resets all key name mapping.
trans-unit.target: 重設所有金鑰名稱對應。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to clear all key name mapping that you have set using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.AddKeyNameMapping%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來清除您已設定使用的所有索引鍵名稱對應<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.AddKeyNameMapping%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The data to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要解密的資料。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts an <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element using the specified symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的對稱演算法，解密 <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the raw decrypted plain text.
trans-unit.target: 包含原始解密純文字的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptData%2A> method to decrypt an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptData%2A>方法來解密<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>使用對稱金鑰的項目。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptData%2A> method only decrypts top-level <`EncryptedData`> tags.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptData%2A>方法只會解密最上層 <`EncryptedData`> 標記。

trans-unit.source: In cases where one or more <`EncryptedData`> tags have been encrypted and are contained within higher level <`EncryptedData`> tags, you can call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A> method separately for each one.
trans-unit.target: 萬一其中一個或多個 <`EncryptedData`> 標記已加密，而且包含在較高的層級 <`EncryptedData`> 標記，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A>分別為每個方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A> method for a code example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A>方法程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密使用對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: 此範例不包含任何金鑰資訊加密的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="encryptedData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="encryptedData" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value of the <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts all <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> elements of the XML document that were specified during initialization of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 解密 XML 文件的所有 <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> 項目，這些項目在初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> 類別時指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A> method decrypts all `<EncryptedData>` elements of the XML document loaded during initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A>方法會解密所有`<EncryptedData>`初始化期間載入的 XML 文件的項目。

trans-unit.source: After you call this method, all `<EncryptedData>` elements in the document are replaced with plain text versions.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法之後, 所有`<EncryptedData>`文件中的項目取代成純文字版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A> method decrypts only top-level `<EncryptedData>` elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A>方法解密只有最上層`<EncryptedData>`項目。

trans-unit.source: If you need to decrypt a super-encrypted document (a document that is encrypted more than once), you must call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A> method repeatedly until all the `<EncryptedData>` elements have been decrypted.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要解密的進階加密的文件 （已加密一次以上的文件），您必須呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A>方法重複直到所有`<EncryptedData>`項目已解密。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A> method decrypts only valid XML data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptDocument%2A>方法解密只有有效的 XML 資料。

trans-unit.source: To decrypt arbitrary data, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要解密的任意資料，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DecryptData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To use XML Encryption with X.509 certificates, you must have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed and the X.509 certificate must use the Enhanced Provider.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 XML 加密使用 X.509 憑證，您必須具有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝和 X.509 憑證必須使用增強型提供者。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed or the X.509 certificate does not use the Enhanced Provider, a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> with an "Unknown Error" will be thrown when you decrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝或 X.509 憑證不會使用增強的提供者，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>與"Unknown Error"將會擲回時解密 XML 文件。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the evidence of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object from which the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> object is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 物件的辨識項，這是建構 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml" /> 物件的來源物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: If the XML document used to create the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object has any security evidence, you should add the evidence to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DocumentEvidence%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 文件用來建立<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>物件有任何安全性辨識項，所以您應該將辨識項，以便<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.DocumentEvidence%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, any associated <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference> objects will not be dereferenced because they will not be granted the required permission set.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定這個屬性，所有相關聯<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherReference>物件將不被取值，因為它們未被授與必要的權限集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 加密所使用的編碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: UTF-8 encoding is the default encoding for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: XML 加密編碼預設值是 utf-8 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify other types of encoding from the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> class, such as UTF-16 or ASCII.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來指定其他類型的編碼方式從<xref:System.Text.Encoding>utf-16 或 ASCII 等類別。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the outer XML of an element using the specified certificate or key in the key mapping table.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的憑證或金鑰對應表中的指定金鑰，加密項目的外部 XML。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密 XML 文件使用 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.target: 要加密的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate to use for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密的 X.509 憑證。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the outer XML of an element using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 憑證，加密項目的外部 XML。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> element that represents the encrypted XML data.
trans-unit.target: 代表加密 XML 資料的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.Encrypt%2A> method is a convenient way to encrypt the outer XML of an element using a certificate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.Encrypt%2A>方法是便利的方式來加密使用的憑證項目的外部 XML。

trans-unit.source: This method generates a 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) session key to encrypt an XML element and then encrypts and signs the AES key using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會產生 256 位元進階加密標準 (AES) 工作階段金鑰加密 XML 項目，然後加密並簽署 AES 金鑰使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.Encrypt%2A> method then returns the resulting XML as an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.Encrypt%2A>方法接著會傳回所產生的 XML，做為<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>項目。

trans-unit.source: If you need more control over the encryption, so you can place the encrypted information into a `<CipherReference>` element or specify whether the entire XML element or just its contents should be encrypted, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptData%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更充分掌控加密，因此您可以將加密的資訊到`<CipherReference>`項目，或指定的整個 XML 項目或只是它的內容是否應為加密，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptData%2A>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: To use XML Encryption with X.509 certificates, you must have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed and the X.509 certificate must use the Enhanced Provider.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 XML 加密使用 X.509 憑證，您必須具有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝和 X.509 憑證必須使用增強型提供者。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed or the X.509 certificate does not use the Enhanced Provider, a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> with an "Unknown Error" will be thrown when you decrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有 Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider 安裝或 X.509 憑證不會使用增強的提供者，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>與"Unknown Error"將會擲回時解密 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to encrypt only the contents of the element; <see langword="false" /> to encrypt the entire element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示只加密項目的內容，<see langword="false" /> 表示加密整個項目。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the specified element or its contents using the specified symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的對稱演算法，加密指定的項目或其內容。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted data.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The returned byte array data is the value of the `<CipherValue>` element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的位元組陣列資料是值`<CipherValue>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密使用對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: 此範例不包含任何金鑰資訊加密的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="inputElement" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inputElement" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value of the <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the key that a recipient uses to decrypt an <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 加密收件者用來解密 <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> 項目的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptKey%2A> method to encrypt the key that a recipient uses to decrypt an `<EncryptedData>` element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptKey%2A>方法來加密收件者用來解密金鑰`<EncryptedData>`項目。

trans-unit.source: This method places the encrypted key within an `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將內的加密的金鑰`<EncryptedKey>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將加密的非對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The key to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts a key using a symmetric algorithm that a recipient uses to decrypt an <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用對稱演算法，加密收件者用來解密 <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> 項目的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the encrypted value of the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，代表 <paramref name="keyData" /> 參數的加密值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptKey%2A> method to encrypt the key that a recipient uses to decrypt an `<EncryptedData>` element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptKey%2A>方法來加密收件者用來解密金鑰`<EncryptedData>`項目。

trans-unit.source: This method accepts a value for the `symmetricAlgorithm` parameter that represents either the Triple DES algorithm or the AES key wrap algorithm (also called Rijndael).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可接受的值`symmetricAlgorithm`代表三重 DES 演算法或 AES 金鑰包裝演算法 （也稱為 Rijndael） 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not automatically place the encrypted key within an `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法會自動並不會加密的金鑰內`<EncryptedKey>`項目。

trans-unit.source: You must manually create the `<EncryptedKey>` element within your document.
trans-unit.target: 您必須手動建立`<EncryptedKey>`文件內的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyData" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value of the <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> parameter is not the Triple DES Key Wrap algorithm or the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) Key Wrap algorithm (also called Rijndael).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithm" /> 參數的值不是三重 DES Key Wrap 演算法或 Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) Key Wrap 演算法 (也稱為 Rijndael)。

trans-unit.source: The key to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 要加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric key used to encrypt <c>keyData</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用來加密 <c>keyData</c> 的非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the key that a recipient uses to decrypt an <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 加密收件者用來解密 <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> 項目的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents the encrypted value of the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列，代表 <paramref name="keyData" /> 參數的加密值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptKey%2A> method to encrypt the key that a recipient uses to decrypt an `<EncryptedData>` element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.EncryptKey%2A>方法來加密收件者用來解密金鑰`<EncryptedData>`項目。

trans-unit.source: This method accepts a value for `rsa` that represents either the RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 algorithm or the RSA PKCS#1 type 2 algorithm (also called OAEP).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可接受的值`rsa`表示 RSA PKCS #1 v1.5 演算法或 RSA PKCS #1 類型 2 演算法 （也稱為 OAEP）。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not automatically place the encrypted key within an `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，這個方法會自動並不會加密的金鑰內`<EncryptedKey>`項目。

trans-unit.source: You must manually create the `<EncryptedKey>` element within your document.
trans-unit.target: 您必須手動建立`<EncryptedKey>`文件內的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將加密的非對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立的對稱工作階段金鑰來加密文件，並再插入 XML 文件中內嵌工作階段金鑰的加密的版本會使用非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="keyData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="keyData" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value of the <paramref name="rsa" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rsa" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> object that contains the initialization vector (IV) to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> 物件，包含要擷取的初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the decryption initialization vector (IV) from an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> 物件擷取解密初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the decryption initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 包含解密初始化向量 (IV) 的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Given an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> object, this method retrieves the decryption initialization vector (IV).
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>物件，這個方法會擷取解密初始化向量 (IV)。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior retrieves the IV as the first bytes of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A> byte array.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為，IV 擷取的第一個位元組當做<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData.CipherValue%2A>位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: For a list of Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) values supported by the `symmetricAlgorithmUri` parameter, see the list of constant fields associated with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需所支援的統一資源識別元 (URI) 值的清單`symmetricAlgorithmUri`參數，與相關聯的常數欄位清單，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="encryptedData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="encryptedData" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="encryptedData" /> parameter has an <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType.EncryptionMethod" /> property that is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="encryptedData" /> 參數值有為 null 的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType.EncryptionMethod" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value of the <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithmUrisymAlgUri" /> parameter is not a supported algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="symmetricAlgorithmUrisymAlgUri" /> 參數的值為不支援的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> object that contains the decryption key to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> 物件，包含要擷取的解密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the decryption key from the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData" /> 物件擷取解密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm" /> object associated with the decryption key.
trans-unit.target: 與解密金鑰相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Given an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> object, this method looks for the decryption key that can be used to retrieve the plain text data.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>物件，這個方法會尋找可以用來擷取純文字資料的解密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: If a key name is specified, the method looks for the symmetric algorithm or asymmetric algorithm that is associated with the key name as defined in the key name mapping.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定索引鍵的名稱，則方法會尋找與相關聯的索引鍵名稱的索引鍵名稱對應中所定義的非對稱演算法的對稱演算法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if a retrieval method or an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object is specified, the method loads the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object and calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.GetDecryptionKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，如果擷取方法或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>指定的物件，此方法會載入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>物件並呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.GetDecryptionKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="encryptedData" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="encryptedData" /> 參數的值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The encryptedData parameter has an <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType.EncryptionMethod" /> property that is null.
trans-unit.target: encryptedData 參數有 null 的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType.EncryptionMethod" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The encrypted key cannot be retrieved using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用指定的參數，擷取加密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object that contains an element with an ID value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 物件，包含具有 ID 值的項目。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ID value.
trans-unit.target: 代表 ID 值的字串。

trans-unit.source: Determines how to resolve internal Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) references.
trans-unit.target: 判斷如何解析內部統一資源識別元 (URI) 參考。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that contains an ID indicating how internal Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) are to be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 包含 ID 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件，這個 ID 表示如何解析內部統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.GetIdElement%2A> method determines how to resolve internal Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.GetIdElement%2A>方法判斷如何解析內部統一資源識別元 (Uri)。

trans-unit.source: It looks for elements with a specified value or for elements with an ID attribute that has a specified value.
trans-unit.target: 它會尋找具有指定值的項目或項目的 ID 屬性為具有指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cipher mode used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 加密所使用的 Cipher 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode is the default cipher mode for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Cipher 區塊鏈結 (CBC) 模式是預設的 XML 加密的加密模式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify other cipher modes of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode> enumeration, such as Cipher Feedback (CFB) mode.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性指定的其他加密模式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode>列舉型別，例如加密的意見反應 (CFB) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding mode used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 加密所使用的填補模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode" /> values that specifies the type of padding used for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode" /> 值，指定加密所使用的填補類型。

trans-unit.source: ISO-10126 padding is the default padding mode for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: ISO 10126 填補為 XML 加密的預設填補模式。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify other padding modes of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode> enumeration, such as ANSI X9.23 or PKCS#5.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來指定其他的填補模式的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PaddingMode>列舉型別，例如 ANSI X9.23 或 PKCS #5。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the recipient of the encrypted key information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定加密金鑰資訊的收件者。

trans-unit.source: The recipient of the encrypted key information.
trans-unit.target: 加密金鑰資訊的收件者。

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> object referenced by a key name by examining the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.CarriedKeyName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>藉由檢查索引鍵名稱所參考的物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.CarriedKeyName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.Recipient%2A> property to identify the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> element that the current recipient can decrypt to retrieve a decryption key.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.Recipient%2A>屬性來識別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>目前收件者可以擷取解密金鑰來解密的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element to replace.
trans-unit.target: 要取代的 <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The decrypted data to replace <c>inputElement</c> with.
trans-unit.target: 用來取代 <c>inputElement</c> 的解密資料。

trans-unit.source: Replaces an <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> element with a specified decrypted sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的解密位元組序列，取代 <see langword="<EncryptedData>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.ReplaceData%2A> method replaces an `<EncryptedData>` element with the value of the `decryptedData` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.ReplaceData%2A>方法取代`<EncryptedData>`項目，其值為`decryptedData`參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> object used by the Document Object Model (DOM) to resolve external XML references.

trans-unit.source: This property contains an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object used to resolve external XML resources such as entities, document type definitions (DTDs), or schemas.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>用來解析外部 XML 資源，例如實體、 文件類型定義 (Dtd) 或結構描述的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML digital signature recursion depth to prevent infinite recursion and stack overflow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 數位簽章的遞迴深度，以防止無限遞迴和堆疊溢位。

trans-unit.source: This might happen if the digital signature XML contains the URI which then points back to the original XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 數位簽章包含回頭指向原始 XML 的 URI，就可能發生這種狀況。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the 128-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) Key Wrap algorithm (also known as the Rijndael Key Wrap algorithm).
trans-unit.target: 代表 128 位元進階加密標準 (AES) 金鑰包裝演算法 (又稱為 Rijndael 金鑰包裝演算法) 的命名空間統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncAES128KeyWrapUrl> field is "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#kw-aes128".
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncAES128KeyWrapUrl>欄位是"http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#kw-aes128"。

trans-unit.source: Represents the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the 128-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) algorithm (also known as the Rijndael algorithm).
